statements: SELECT * FROM employee_training_records WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, training_topic, training_date FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_topic = 'SQL Basics';
SELECT training_topic, training_duration_hours FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_date = '2022-10-15' ORDER BY training_duration_hours DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_duration_hours > 5 ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY training_date DESC, training_duration_hours ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_name, training_topic FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_duration_hours > 3 ORDER BY employee_name ASC, training_duration_hours DESC;
SELECT employee_name, training_topic, training_duration_hours FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_topic LIKE '%SQL%' ORDER BY training_duration_hours DESC, employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_records WHERE employee_id IN (101, 103, 105) ORDER BY employee_id ASC;

SELECT employee_name, training_topic, training_duration_hours FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY training_duration_hours DESC, employee_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT'
SELECT id, name FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM training_records WHERE training_date < '2022-06-01'
SELECT id, name, department, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT id, name, department, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01' AND hire_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY name;

SELECT name, department, hire_date, training_type, training_date, duration_hours FROM employees e JOIN training_records tr ON e.id = tr.employee_id WHERE tr.training_type = 'Technical' ORDER BY department, training_date;
SELECT id, name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department IN ('IT', 'Marketing') AND hire_date < '2020-01-01' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT e.id, e.name, count(tr.record_id) AS training_count FROM employees e LEFT JOIN training_records tr ON e.id = tr.employee_id GROUP BY e.id, e.name ORDER BY training_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_record WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT full_name, department FROM employee WHERE hire_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, full_name FROM employee WHERE manager_id = 1001 ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT training_title, training_date FROM employee_training_record WHERE training_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY training_date ASC;
SELECT full_name, department, hire_date, manager_id FROM employee WHERE department = 'HR' AND manager_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_record ORDER BY training_date DESC, training_title ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT employee_id, full_name, department FROM employee WHERE department='IT' AND hire_date > '2020-01-01'
SELECT employee_id, training_title, completion_status FROM employee_training_record WHERE completion_status=true AND training_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01'
SELECT e.full_name, t.training_title, tc.score FROM employee AS e JOIN employee_training_record AS t ON e.employee_id = t.employee_id JOIN training_completion AS tc ON t.id = tc.training_id
SELECT employee_id, full_name, department, manager_id FROM employee ORDER BY manager_id ASC, employee_id DESC
SELECT * FROM employee_training_records;
SELECT employee_name, training_course FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT DISTINCT department_name FROM employee_department;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM training_courses WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT employee_id, training_completed, training_score FROM department_training_records WHERE department_name = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM employee_training_records;
SELECT employee_name, training_course FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, training_course, training_date FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_course LIKE 'SQL%';
SELECT employee_id, training_date FROM employee_training_records ORDER BY training_date DESC;

SELECT department_name, employee_position, training_completed FROM employee_department INNER JOIN department_training_records ON employee_department.employee_id = department_training_records.employee_id WHERE training_score >= 80;
SELECT * FROM Employees ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, department FROM Employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT * FROM TrainingSessions WHERE session_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_id, session_id, completion_date FROM EmployeeTraining WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT trainer_name, specialty FROM Trainers ORDER BY specialty ASC;
SELECT * FROM Employees ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, department FROM Employees WHERE department='HR';
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, t.topic FROM Employees e INNER JOIN EmployeeTraining et ON e.employee_id = et.employee_id INNER JOIN TrainingSessions t ON et.session_id = t.session_id;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM Employees;
SELECT t.trainer_name, ts.topic, ts.session_date FROM Trainers t INNER JOIN TrainingSessions ts ON t.trainer_id = ts.trainer ORDER BY ts.session_date DESC;
